scripts.build-dev: NODE_ENV=development ./node_modules/.bin/react-native bundle --platform android --dev true --entry-file index.js   --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production ./node_modules/.bin/react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js   --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.codepush: NODE_ENV=production appcenter codepush release-react  -e index.js -d Staging -a yassermzh/gonogo --debug
